about_the_game:
Three different kinds of unique eyewear for those who want to take fashion to the next NEXT level.

VR Headset x 10
Warrior's Eyepatch x 10
Phantom Thief B Mask x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
